resources.string:
Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, 
 looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. 
 
 Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32. 
 

The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham. 
 

Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. 
 Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. 
 

Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32. /n /n
The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested. Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.

Keeping the growing demand of tertiary level education of the people in mind, Comilla University was established in 2006 as the 26th public sector university of Bangladesh. As a result, the untiring effort and wait of the people of this region was over when the announcement of establishing Comilla University came. The people of Cumilla were overjoyed as their concerted effort and demand of a university here for long and their contribution in spreading and nurturing the tradition of exploring knowledge and culture had at last got recognition in the form of the foundation of this university. Comilla University has at last become a milestone in the history of higher education in Bangladesh.
Set beside the ancient Shalban Bihar, one of the world’s remarkable Bihar at Cumilla, this University is not merely an educational institution, it takes its pride on having a glorified historical significance too. And so its name and fame is soaring up with the passage of time not only in the country but in the world as well. To meet up the great expectations of the country in the field of higher education, the university is moving smoothly on the way of achieving academic excellence and adding its share to the overall development of the country. With its unique academic and administrative set up, the university has already attracted the attention of the scholars from different parts of the country and abroad as well. The teachers, the students and the officers are performing their roles wonderfully to make it a university with an international quality of education and research.
The university aims at imparting quality education, creating new knowledge and enhancing the critical sensibility of the learners in every possible sense. Logically, it tries to contribute to the intellectual growth of the country and make every effort to provide a harmonious ambience to nourish that intellectuality.
Come, visit us! You will certainly be happy to enjoy the natural setting of the university along with the scholarly pursuits at our academia

The Department of Information and Communication Technology (ICT) of Comilla University started its incredible journey of 4-years B.Sc.(Engg.) program in 2010. Well ahead in 2014 it started the 1-year M.Sc. (Engg.) program in Information and Communication Technology. Since its inception, the Department is playing a vibrant role in building skilled ICT professional and researchers not only inside Bangladesh but also all over the world. It has overwhelming dominance in ICT-based higher education and research.
Name of the programs Undergraduate and Graduate Vision
To provide highly qualified, knowledgeable and skilled ICT professionals in the latest state of techniques who will be involved in research, design and development in the national and international arena.
Mission
•To contribute and adhere into the journey of digitization of Bangladesh through interactive teaching learning process and conducting hi-tech research.
•To innovate technology based new ideas and promote applicable knowledge for the welfare of the nation.
•To extend the global perception of the sprouting professionals who can take an active role in the technological evolution of the world.
Program objectives
The department is endeavoring the following objectives:
•International standard of quality education.
•Correlate technical knowledge with professional ethics.
•Train-up students in enlightening their inner abilities for problem solving and critical thinking.
